CustomField.description: When evaluation time is Bill Generation, the value of evaluation component at the time of bill generation is considered. If Last Disbursement is selected, the value of evaluation component after the last disbursement is considered.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When evaluation time is Bill Generation, the value of evaluation component at the time of bill generation is considered. If Last Disbursement is selected, the value of evaluation component after the last disbursement is considered.
CustomField.label: Evaluation Time
